name: Wind Environment
description: Strong wind blowing across the screen, affecting the movement of objects or characters.

fields.name: Activation Variable
fields.description: The local variable number that triggers or activates the wind effect.

fields.name: Wind Direction
fields.description: Defines the direction in which the wind is blowing.

0.name: East
0.description: The wind is blowing to the east.

1.name: West
1.description: The wind is blowing to the west.

2.name: South
2.description: The wind is blowing to the south.

3.name: North
3.description: The wind is blowing to the north.
